activities: Spatial Corp. has subsidiary companies in the United Kingdom and in Germany as well as individuals in France.  Most personal information received from the the EU is communicated between Human Resources, Payroll Accountants, Enrolling New Employees, Screening Applicants.  Actual information may include personal/national ID numbers, employee dates of birth, contact information.
privacyprograms: Required Data Privacey Training for all Employees.  Data Privacy Updates via seminars and notifications from US attorneys, and Mountain States Employment Council
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs); For all other types of data: American Arbitration Association (AAA)
